channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 7a2b6e6c-472e-4b39-8878-a26eb63d75c6
Display name: Microsoft Discovery Platform Administrator (Preview)
Description: Grants full access to manage Microsoft.Discovery resources. This role in preview and subjet to change.
Link: https://management.azure.com/7a2b6e6c-472e-4b39-8878-a26eb63d75c6?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 3bb7c424-af4e-436b-bfcc-8779c8934c31
Display name: Microsoft Discovery Platform Reader (Preview)
Description: Grants readonly permissions to view Microsoft.Discovery resources. This role in preview and subjet to change.
Link: https://management.azure.com/3bb7c424-af4e-436b-bfcc-8779c8934c31?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 01288891-85ee-45a7-b367-9db3b752fc65
Display name: Microsoft Discovery Platform Contributor (Preview)
Description: Grants permissions to view and operate on most Discovery platform resources, including workspaces, supercomputers, storages, agents, bookshelves, data containers, models, tools, workflows, and investigations, as well as perform data plane actions, but does not allow creating, updating, or deleting core resources such as workspaces, supercomputers, storages, bookshelves, node pools, or projects. This role is in preview and subject to change.
Link: https://management.azure.com/01288891-85ee-45a7-b367-9db3b752fc65?api-version=2022-04-01
